data.title: Lizzy Graham - Enterprise Sales Director at Vangst
data.meta_description: Lizzy Graham has a wealth of work experience, beginning with a role as an Assembly Line Worker at Chrysler in 1996.
data.text:
Lizzy Graham has a wealth of work experience, beginning with a role as an Assembly Line Worker at Chrysler in 1996. Lizzy then moved on to a Sponsorship and Events Manager position at PBS 106.7FM in 2003. In 2006, they were a Market Research Manager at National Australia Bank and a Marketing Manager at New Found Frequency. The following year, they were a Director, Business Development at New Found Network. In 2011, they began working as an Enterprise Sales Director at Aquent. Currently, they are an Enterprise Account Director for Vangst, the premier talent and tech resource solutions for the cannabis industry.

Lizzy Graham has a diverse educational background. Lizzy obtained a Certification in Diversity and Inclusion from Cornell University in 2021. Lizzy also holds a Masters in Communication and New Media from Wayne State University, which they completed between 1999 and 2001. Additionally, they hold an Honours in Communication and Media Studies from the University of Windsor, which they completed between 1996 and 2000. Graham also has two additional certifications: The Science of Well-Being from Yale University obtained in December 2020, and Negotiation to Win | Sales Strategy from the American Management Association obtained in August 2017.
